thread.title: Drake Explains Why He Had To Destroy Meek Mill
thread.title_full: Drake Explains Why He Had To Destroy Meek Mill

author: Zakk Feig
title: Drake Explains Why He Had To Destroy Meek Mill
text:
Home > Music > Drake Explains Why He Had To Destroy Meek Mill Drake Explains Why He Had To Destroy Meek Mill 0 0 Posted by Zakk Feig , Feb 18, 2017 at 10:12pm Drake lets it all out. 
Tonight, Drake delivered his most frank and revealing interview to date, basically explaining his entire beef with Meek Mill , and why people are wrong in thinking he doesn't write his own raps. 
Drake also discussed who Quentin Miller is, the work they did together, and why DJ Drama is to blame for a lot of this strife. It's a lengthy story, but anyone interested in hip-hop culture needs to listen to this interview as soon as they can. 
Listen to Drake discuss his beef with Meek Mill below around 28:45. What do y'all think? Will the ghostwriting jokes end after this?
